context.p: Please refer to the technical data sheet for all connecting dimensions.

step.cmd: Locate the grey water inflow from the building.

info.p: Venting must be ensured via the inflow.
The grey water overflow must be provided with an on-site connection to the existing wastewater line.
Please ensure an adequate backflow device in the overflow line.

step.cmd: Connect the tubes of the filtration pump to the nozzles of assembly group (observe designation/colour coding).
